content: In order to drag and drop an item to change position, you can do so by clicking with the left mouse button and hold.
While holding down the mouse button - drag the item to the desirable position and let go of the mouse button to drop the item.
Shopping and Todo items have the option to toggle them complete.
To toggle an item complete - click on the gray circle on the right side of the chosen item to mark it complete / incomplete.
In order to remove items, click on the trash can icon in the lower left corner of the screen to start the delete mode.
While delete mode is active, each item will now have a trashcan icon on their right side, to remove an item - click on the trashcan.
To remove all items, click on the 'Delete all' button in the delete menu.
To cancel the delete mode, click on the 'Cancel' button in the delete menu.
To create a list can click on the + sign if you are at the homescreen.
You can also create a new list by clicking on the account menu (user icon) to get a dropdown of alternatives.
Click on the 'New list' option to open the create list box.
In order to share your list with someone - click on the 'Share' button in the navigation bar at the top of your screen.
A box will open up with a search bar. Type in the name of the person you wish to share your list with.
Click on the person in the search field and then click on the 'Update' button.
In order to assign an item to a user, click on the chosen item to open up a container.
In the container all users in the list will be shown. Click on the 'Assign' button to assign a specific user.
If a user is assigned, they will be moved to the 'Assigned users' title.
To remove the assign from a user, click on the 'Remove' button.
If items are assigned to user, you have the option to only show items that are assigned to you.
You can toggle this function by clicking on the gray circle in the bottom right corner.
If the 'Assigned Only' option is chosen and nothing is shown, that means no item is assigned to you.
To update an item, click on the chosen item to open up a the update and assign container.
At the top of the container, the selected items values are in input fields, simply update the values to your desired values.
When you are done, click the 'Update' button and the item is updated.
Favorite items are items that the user can save in a favorites list to be added into a Shopping list.
This is so the user can save time adding regular bought items.
And also a functions as a reminder to see what could be needed to buy.
The Favorite list can be viewed and maintained in the favorited page. Found in the user menu under 'Favorites'.
There are two ways to add an item to your favorites list
1) In the 'Favorite' page, type in chosen item into the input field and click 'Add'.
2) In a Shopping list. Click on a gray heart to add that item to your favorite list.
There are two ways to add an item to your favorites list
In the 'Favorite' page, click on the white trash can icon to remove a favorite.
If you have favorite items, a button 'Add Favorites', will appear in a Shopping list.
Click on said button and an container with all your favorites will appear.
To add a favorite item to your list, click the 'Add' button on the right side.
If the 'Add' button is gray. That means that the item is already in your list
